task.title: Amending Subscriptions
task.abstract: Admins will amend subscriptions for several reasons, such as increasing the seats for a membership and purchasing additional subscriptions.Admin users are permitted to amend, adjust, and refund subscriptions in the eStore. Admins must create subscription items that are included in Package Items and mark the subscription items as "Not for Individual Sale"; otherwise a new Sales Order is created, rather than amended.

step.cmd: Navigate to the eBusiness app, click on the Contacts tab, and select the Contact requiring a subscription amendment.
Navigate to the Subscriptions related list and click the Subscription ID to return the Subscription record.

step.stepresult: A new Sales Order is created.

step.cmd: Navigate to the Sales Order Lines related list and copy the Sales Order Line ID.
step.info: The copied Sales Order ID is the number of the Parent Sales Order Line.

step.cmd: Click the New Sales Order Line button.
Select an Item that is different from the item on the Parent Sales Order via the lookup and check the Is Amendment checkbox.
step.info: Instead of selecting the same item, create an independent Sales Order.

step.cmd: Paste the copied ID into the Parent Sales Order Line field and click Save.
Click the Sales Order ID to return the Sales Order record.
Update the Status to Closed and click Save.

substep.cmd: Update the Posting Status to Posted and click Save.
